properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.encode
properties.description: default encode for nacos config content.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.prefix
properties.description: the prefix of dataId, nacos config data meta info. dataId = prefix + '-' + ${spring.active.profile} + `.` + ${spring.cloud.nacos.config.file-extension}.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.file-extension
properties.description: the suffix of nacos config dataId, also the file extension of config content, only support properties now.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.shared-dataids
properties.description: the dataids for configurable multiple shared configurations , multiple separated by commas. recommend to use {@link NacosConfigProperties#sharedConfigs} .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.shared-configs
properties.description: a set of shared configurations . eg: spring.cloud.nacos.config.shared-configs[0] .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.refreshableDataids
properties.description: refreshable dataids , multiple separated by commas ,recommend to use {@link NacosConfigProperties#refreshableDataIds} .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.refreshable-dataids
properties.description: a set of refreshable configurations , eg: spring.cloud.nacos.config.refreshable-dataids[0] .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.ext-configs
properties.description: a set of extended configurations. recommend to use {@link NacosConfigProperties#extConfigs} .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.refresh-enabled
properties.description: the master switch for refresh configuration, enable nacos config refresh or not .
